plot: Wilfried Neuss has been on the quest for the perfect sound of Robert Schumann's "Dreaming" since his childhood. But when he finally finds the ultimate hifi-system, a tinnitus destroys his hopes and drives him towards insanity.
title: Wilfried Neuss - Eine Sinfonie in fünf Sätzen
plot_es: Wilfried Neuss has been on the quest for the perfect sound of Robert Schumann's "Dreaming" since his childhood. But when he finally finds the ultimate hifi-system, a tinnitus destroys his hopes and drives him towards insanity.
original_name: Wilfried Neuss - Eine Sinfonie in fünf Sätzen
